channel.title: Calas on Cloudian
channel.description: Recent content in Calas on Cloudian

item.title: Internship Timeline
item.description: Motivation for the internship: # I am passionate about forging a career in research and innovation within computer engineering. This internship offers a unique opportunity to translate my theoretical knowledge into hands-on expertise by designing and building a processor from the ground up.

item.title: Learning Logs
item.description: This is where I will update my daily progress and activities.

item.title: Week 1
item.description: Week 1 Learning Log (May 19–23, 2025) # 1. Objectives # Grasp FPGA internal architecture: CLBs, LUTs, and on-chip SRAM/Block RAM Install and configure Vivado/Vitis on Windows Implement and simulate basic arithmetic primitives: Half Adder (half_adder.
